definition: at a distance of/distance/to be apart
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

sentences.english: We hope to shorten the distance after Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 我們希望在星期六之後能縮短距離。

sentences.english: Forklift vehicle used to transport heavy exhibit materials short distance and for loading and unloading materials.
sentences.chinese: 剷車，主要用於重量大展品裝卸和短距離移動。

sentences.english: Not only can walking fish live out of water，but they can also travel short distances over land.
sentences.chinese: 鮎魚不僅可以離開水存活，還可以在岸上短距離移動。

sentences.english: The marines could shoot from a distance and also do close hand-to-hand combat.
sentences.chinese: 艦隊可遠距離射擊也可作短距離的戰鬥。

sentences.english: Most of our pursuit planes were still handicapped by short range.
sentences.chinese: 當時我們的大部份驅逐機仍被侷限於短距離。

sentences.english: Grade I A short climb close to the road with bombproof belays and an easy descent.
sentences.chinese: 在路旁短距離的攀登，有安全的確保且容易下降。

sentences.english: The extend direction of crack tips is given by the judgment of mini-plastic zone displacement.
sentences.chinese: 根據塑性區最短距離判據分析了裂紋的擴展方向。

sentences.english: The great-circle distance calculates the shortest distance between any two points on the surface of a sphere.
sentences.chinese: 大圓弧長計算球面兩點之間的最短距離。

sentences.english: He's allowed the shortest kick off the wall here.
sentences.chinese: 我只允許他蹬壁後做最短距離的打腿。

sentences.english: At the same time, optimize the combination prediction results according to the shortest distance.
sentences.chinese: 同時，基於最短距離對組合預測結果進行優化處理。

sentences.english: The shortest distance between two points is a straight line.
sentences.chinese: 兩點之間的最短距離是直線。

sentences.english: If the short-distance driving during pregnancy, not to take forward driving position.
sentences.chinese: 懷孕期間若是短距離駕駛，不要採取前傾的姿勢駕駛。

sentences.english: Bluetooth is a secure means of connecting devices using a short-range frequency.
sentences.chinese: 藍牙是一種安全的使用短距離頻率連接設備的方式。

sentences.english: Then do some short jogs , but no more than what you can do easily.
sentences.chinese: 然後做些短距離的慢跑，但是僅做你所能容易做到的。

sentences.english: Not only can walking fish live out of water , but they can also travel short distances over land.
sentences.chinese: 魚不但能在水外行走，而且能在陸地上短距離的移動。

definition: Changjiang 長江|长江 or Yangtze River/old name for Changjiang, especially lower reaches around Yangzhou 揚州|扬州
to bridge/to put up a bridge
Hengchun Peninsula in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], the southernmost point of Taiwan
to kill two birds with one stone (idiom)
to drive a vehicle/movement of vehicles
roads open in all directions (idiom); accessible from all sides
